text: Hey, hows it going
can't complain, youreslf?
Im ok, just doing some work lol. So, do you want to donate any of your income to a Save the Children charity?
yeah sure, why not
Awesome, how much do you want to donate?
is there an upper limit?
I dont think there is
how much are you thinking of donating
Oh I see, it says here that it will be deducted from your task payment. Wonder how that will work.
I don't believe they can actually do that haha
Yeah, same. I assume it will be deducted from any bonuses they decide to give.
hows $0.50 sound?
Sounds good to me lol
ok, good deal, $0.50 it is.
Alright, awesome, guess that's it then?
I think so, it said we need to get to 10 turns of the conversation each, this is my 8th lol
Ah, yeah I just counted mine as well. Well, unless, you want to donate more, I think we're pretty much done here.
I'm fine with staying at $0.50 as long as you are
Im good with that as well. Thanks for your quick responses btw. A lot of the time, these things don't go very smoothly since you have to wait a while for a response.
ugh yeah, i've seen that, you sit there waiting forever for someone to type two words haha
Yeah, true, it's terrible. Thanks for your help and have a good Turk day :D
you too!!!!! :D
